formElement.label: Configuration:
formElement.documentation: The name of the config which holds all the connection information. This must reference a valid existing configuration.

formElement.label: Key name:
formElement.documentation: Name of the key pair to delete.

formElement.label: Reservation Id:
formElement.documentation: The reservation id to clean up. All instances in the reservation will be cleaned up.

formElement.label: List of Volumes:
formElement.documentation: Name of volumes to delete on termination. Separate list of volume id's with semi-colons.

formElement.label: List of Resources:
formElement.documentation: List of Commander resources to delete. Separate a list of resources with semi-colons.
